formalpara.title: UserDoc.JargonFree
formalpara.para: The system documentation must contain minimal uses of technical jargon. The system documentation must define technical jargon where it is first used. "Jargon" is defined as a word that is technical in nature and is not listed in a Webster's or Oxford English dictionary.

formalpara.title: UserDoc.ContextAware
formalpara.para: The system must allow the user to read documentation relevant to the phase of installation that is currently on-screen.
